import React from 'react'; export default class CreateExpense extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state ={ cateExpense:"", expense:"", amount:"" } } handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state) fetch("http://localhost/5.API/3.api_expense/crud_expense.php?cmd=insert", { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(this.state), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }).then(response => { return window.location.hash = "/read-expense" }).catch(err => err) } render(){ return(
this.setState({ expenseID: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ expense: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ amount: e.target.value })} />
    ยกเลิก
) } }
